citation.article-title: Validation of the name Alteromonas luteoviolacea.

p.s: Description of Alteromonas luteoviolucea sp. nov.
Alteromonas luteoviolucea (L. adj. luteus yellow; L. adj. violaceus violet; M.L. adj. luteoviolaceus yellowish violet)
The type strain of A. luteoviolacea is CH130.

This strain has been deposited in the American Type Culture Collection, Rockville, Md., under the number ATCC 33492 and in the National Collection of Marine Bacteria, Aberdeen, Scotland, as NCMB 1893.
It was isolated from surface seawater in the neritic zone near Nice, France.
